biotools.summary: This R package provides a graphical user interface for the gCMAP package. It uses the Rook package and can be used either on a local machine, leveraging R's internal web server, or run on a dedicated rApache web server installation. It allows users to search their own data sources and instructions to generate reference datasets from public repositories are included with the package.

bioschemas.name: gCMAPWeb
